hero.title: Reliable job search by ImkoniRushd
hero.subtitle: We are a licensed private employment agency helping you find jobs in Tajikistan and abroad. Only verified and reliable employers.

apply.title: Apply
apply.subtitle: Leave a request to get a consultation about current vacancies. Provide your name, phone, and city. We will contact you during the day.

form.name: Name
form.consent: By submitting you consent to personal data processing.

consult.title: Consultation
consult.text: We present vacancies and pick suitable ones.

assess.title: Assessment
assess.text: We check your skills against requirements.

interview.title: Interview
interview.text: We organize a talk with the employer.

docs.title: Documents
docs.text: We help collect certificates and confirm qualifications.

prep.title: Preparation
prep.text: We buy tickets and prepare travel documents.

support.title: Support
support.text: We help you adapt in the new place.

about.title: About us
about.p1: ImkoniRushd is a licensed private employment agency operating since 2021. We have bilateral agreements with verified employers to ensure safe and official employment for citizens of Tajikistan.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.text: Make job search simple, reliable, and accessible for everyone.

license.title: License
license.text: operates under a license of the Migration Service of the Republic of Tajikistan.

social.title: Get new vacancies first on our social networks
social.text: Subscribe and receive regular selections of new vacancies.
